DESCRIPTION: Move the specified number of cards from the top of your draw pile to the frozen pile.
Frozen cards are kept in a separate pile, and can only be played or drawn by using cards that specifically interact with #yFrozen cards.
Enemies inflicted with #yHunger deal half damage and take half damage from attacks for 1 turn. If an enemy already has #yHunger, applying it again will deal 10 damage.
Enemies inflicted with #ySatiated deal double damage and take double damage from attacks for 1 turn. If an enemy already has #ySatiated, applying it again will reduce its #yDamage by 5 this turn.
Has additional effects if played from the leftmost spot in your hand.
